name: Medieval Steve Demo
detailed_description:
This is a short, 5 level demo of the game, which should give you a good indication of how the final version will play. Visuals, sound effects and level design are subject to change and are still work in progress. The demo is very stable and has been tested on a number of systems, however, this doesn't mean there won't be any bugs or glitches; if you do manage to 'break' the game, please feel free to get in contact and let me me know!

You play as Steve, the wizards apprentice. You have been imbued with abilities and super strength; not bad for a once, rusty pile of armour! You must battle your way through the varying levels, collecting the broken shards of what we once called home. Along the way, you will encounter enemies from other dimensions, that are interested in one thing and one thing only.....to destroy what's left of the world.

The world needs a hero.

Can you be that hero?

short_description: Steve - a magic pile of armour - must put a stop to the end of the world. Use your abilities to help you crush your enemies, collect gems and upgrade  you abilities, making you stronger, faster and become unstoppable!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660/HD7870/R9-270X
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: You can adjust the settings in game to increase your FPS. I will continue to optimise the game, ensuring older systems are capable of playing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad Core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980/R9 390x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z
